About the Company: Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd is the first group of hospitals that pioneered the concept of corporate healthcare delivery in India.They are a leading private sector healthcare provider in Asia and own and manage a network of speciality hospitals and clinics, a chain of Pharmacy retail outlets across the country, and provides Consultancy Services for commissioning and managing the Speciality Hospitals. Services offered by the company include Cardiology & Cardiothoracic Surgery,Orthopedics & Joint Replacement Surgery,Spine Surgery,Oncology,Medical & Surgical Gastroenterology,Neurology & Neurosurgery,Nephrology & Urology & Critical Care Medicine
